verbose_text: Mammalian p53 as well as the C. elegans homolog of p53, CEP-1, can promote apoptosis or cell cycle arrest in response to DNA damage, heat shock, anoxia, and oxidative or osmotic stresses.
evidence: p53 as well as the C. elegans homolog of p53, CEP-1, can promote apoptosis or cell cycle arrest in response to DNA damage
